title: Dealmaster: Early Amazon Prime Day 2023 deals, Samsung reservations, and more
content:
Amazon Prime Day 2023 is coming on July 11 and 12, but you don't have to wait for the shopping event to score some of the biggest deals. Amazon is already starting the savings with early deals ranging from Amazon-made devices, like the Kindle and Eero promotions, to $100 TVs and discounts on AirPods, MacBooks, and iPads. There are even a few Echo Dot accessories for Star Wars fans. We've rounded up some of the best early Amazon Prime Day deals below, so you can shop early and shop smart. Be sure to have an active Prime membership to get the best deals. We've even added a few deals from other retailers as well.

Apple deals

The 2020 iPad Air—one of several devices supported by today's new software releases. (credit: Samuel Axon)

  • Apple iPad 9th Gen for $270 (was $329) at Amazon
  • Apple iPad 10th Gen for $399 (was $449) at Amazon
  • Apple iPad Pro (12.9-inch, M2) for $1,049 (was $1,099) at Amazon
  • Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation for $200 (was $249) at Amazon
  • Apple AirPods Max for $450 (was $549) at Amazon
  • Apple AirPods 3rd Generation for $149 (was $169) at Amazon

  • Apple Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro 11-inch and iPad Air for $250 (was $299) at Amazon
  • Apple Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro 12.9-inch for $299 (was $349) at Amazon
